title: A Chilean Odyssey by SCOR
content:
From SCOR: “Ready for EPIC biking adventures in Chile? Join SCOR and pro riders Josh ‘Loosedog’ Lewis, Ludo May, and Kasi Schmidt as they embark on a wild journey through stunning landscapes. SCOR gets spicy in episode 1 of our Chilean Odyssey. The first episode showcases the single track and freeriding paradise of the Andean volcanoes. But the trip isn’t just about biking, it’s also a cultural immersion that includes rowdy rodeos and delicious BBQ.”

Produced by Absolute Cine // @absolutecine

Cinematography by David Peacock, Liam Mullany, Andre Nutini

Photography by Bruno Long

The post A Chilean Odyssey by SCOR appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Steve Fisher
